mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (C_Index, C_Name, C_Addr, C_Sales) VALUES (CUSTOMER_SEQ.nextval, #{cName}, #{cAddr}, #{cSales})

INSERT INTO CUSTOMERINFO (C_INDEX, P_NAME, CI_SFTVER, CI_HWOS, CI_SYSTEM, CI_CHECK, CI_MONTHLY, CI_DEGREE, CI_MEMO, P_ID) VALUES (CUSTOMER_SEQ.currval, #{pName}, #{ciSftVer}, #{ciHWOS}, #{ciSystem}, #{ciCheck}, #{ciMonthly}, #{ciDegree}, #{ciMemo}, #{pId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CUSTOMER c LEFT OUTER JOIN CUSTOMERINFO ci ON c.C_Index = ci.C_Index WHERE ci.P_Id = #{pId}
